banner.stages: Prepare your game, live the experience

intro.main: Discover our selection of golf courses
intro.second: Golf courses in Chamonix, led by a high-performance expert coach. Whether you are a beginner, passionate amateur, or a player seeking excellence, these courses adapt to your level: discovery, nature immersion, or intensive improvement. Each session combines technical progress, mental work, and the joy of the game in an exceptional setting at the foot of Mont-Blanc.

stages.title: Our Courses
stages.description: Golf courses in Chamonix, led by a high-performance expert coach. Whether you are a beginner, passionate amateur, or a player seeking excellence, these courses adapt to your level: discovery, nature immersion, or intensive improvement. Each session combines technical progress, mental work, and the joy of the game in an exceptional setting at the foot of Mont-Blanc.

sejours.title: Our Stays
sejours.description: Experience golf more intensely with our stays, tailored to all levels. Discover all our options!

competitions.title: Pro-Am
competitions.description: Join our Pro-Am competitions for an unforgettable golfing experience. Push your potential to the fullest.

stageCustom.title: Custom Courses
stageCustom.description: Do you have a specific need? A precise goal? Our golf courses in Chamonix are designed to adapt to your level and expectations. Each course combines technical progress, mental work, and the joy of the game in an exceptional setting at the foot of Mont-Blanc. Supervised by a high-performance expert coach, these courses allow you to progress quickly while enjoying a unique natural environment. Contact us to learn more.
stageCustom.descriptionMobile: Golf courses in Chamonix, supervised by a high-performance expert coach. Whether you are a beginner, passionate amateur, or a player seeking excellence, these courses adapt to your level: discovery, nature immersion, or intensive improvement. Each session combines technical progress, mental work, and the joy of the game in an exceptional setting at the foot of Mont-Blanc.

presentation.title: The Coach
presentation.description: Qualified professional, I teach golf with passion and rigor. Former coach of the French military ski team, I possess a unique expertise in coaching up to high performance. My teaching methodology is based on a personalized, technical, and mental approach, tailored to all levels of play. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced player, I will accompany you in your progress with kindness, precision, and efficiency.

infoPratique.title: Practical Information
infoPratique.sendMailOrCall: Send us an email or call us at:

coachHome.title: The Coach
coachHome.description: Pierre ASCEDU, a certified professional for over 30 years, teaches golf at the Chamonix Golf Club with passion and precision. A former coach of the French military ski team, he has unique expertise in high-performance coaching. His teaching is based on a personalized, technical, and mental approach, adapted to all levels of play. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced player, he guides you in your progress with accuracy, care, and efficiency. Using modern tools (Trackman, AimPoint, TPI) and extensive field experience, Pierre helps you achieve your goals, whether for leisure or competition.

stageIntensif.title: Intensive Golf Course
stageIntensif.description: This intensive course is designed for experienced golfers who want to improve their game and reach the next level. Led by Pierre ASCEDU, a professional coach with over 30 years of experience, this program combines technique, strategy, and mental preparation to optimize your performance on the course.

program.day1:
Day 1: Technical analysis and goal setting
Video analysis of your swing, evaluation of your short and long game. Personalized goal setting for the course.
program.day2:
Day 2: Swing improvement
Work on posture, grip, and movement. Specific exercises to gain power and precision.
program.day3:
Day 3: Course strategy
On-course session to learn how to handle different game situations. Focus on decision-making and risk management.
program.day4:
Day 4: Mental approach and stress management
Concentration and relaxation techniques to improve your mental game. Competition preparation.
program.day5:
Day 5: Full course and review
Full course with practical application of skills. Personalized review and recommendations for continued improvement.

stageHautePerf.title: High-Performance Golf Course
stageHautePerf.description: This intensive course is designed for golfers who want to take their game to the next level. Led by Pierre ASCEDU, a professional coach with over 30 years of experience, this program combines technique, strategy, and mental preparation to optimize your performance on the course.

program.day1:
Day 1: Technical analysis and goal setting
Video analysis of your swing, evaluation of your short and long game. Personalized goal setting for the course.
program.day2:
Day 2: Swing improvement
Work on posture, grip, and movement. Specific exercises to gain power and precision.
program.day3:
Day 3: Course strategy
On-course session to learn how to handle different game situations. Focus on decision-making and risk management.
program.day4:
Day 4: Mental approach and stress management
Concentration and relaxation techniques to improve your mental game. Competition preparation.
program.day5:
Day 5: Short game and putting
Intensive exercises on chipping, pitching, and putting. Improvement of precision and consistency.
program.day6:
Day 6: Full course and review
Full course with practical application of skills. Personalized review and recommendations for continued improvement.

stageEntreprise.title: Corporate Golf Course
stageEntreprise.description: This corporate golf course is designed to strengthen team cohesion and provide a unique experience for your employees. Led by Pierre ASCEDU, a professional coach, this program combines golf initiation, fun activities, and moments of sharing in an exceptional setting.

program.day1:
Day 1: Initiation and discovery
Introduction to equipment, initiation to swing and putting. Fun activities to promote team cohesion.
program.day2:
Day 2: Challenges and workshops
Technical workshops on short and long games. Team challenges to develop a spirit of collaboration.
program.day3:
Day 3: Course and moments of sharing
Accompanied course to apply the skills learned. Debriefing and moments of conviviality to close the course.

stageDecouverte.title: Discovery Golf Course
stageDecouverte.description: This discovery course is ideal for beginner golfers or those wishing to learn the basics of golf in a friendly environment. Led by Pierre ASCEDU, a professional coach, this program introduces you to the technical and strategic fundamentals of golf while allowing you to enjoy a fun and enriching experience.

program.day1:
Day 1: Initiation and discovery
Introduction to equipment, initiation to swing and putting. Discovering the basics of the game on the practice range.
program.day2:
Day 2: Deepening techniques
Work on grip, posture, and movement. Exercises on short and long games.
program.day3:
Day 3: Course and practical application
Accompanied course to apply the skills learned. Personalized advice to progress and enjoy the game on the course.

stageSwingHouse.title: Swing House Course
stageSwingHouse.description: The Swing House course is a unique experience designed for golf enthusiasts who want to improve their game in a relaxed and friendly atmosphere. Led by Pierre ASCEDU, this course combines technical training.

program.day1:
Day 1: Introduction to Swing House
Welcome and introduction to the Swing House concept. Overview of the facilities and equipment. Initial assessment of each participant’s level.
program.day2:
Day 2: Technical training
Focus on swing mechanics and body positioning. Individualized drills to improve technique. Video analysis of swings for personalized feedback.
program.day3:
Day 3: Course play and strategy
On-course session to apply learned techniques. Emphasis on course management and shot selection. Group discussions on strategies for different course situations.

swingHouse.title: Our partner
swingHouse.description: Swing House is a dedicated space for golfers to refine their skills and enjoy a unique experience. Equipped with state-of-the-art technology and a welcoming atmosphere, it is the perfect place to practice, learn, and connect with fellow golf enthusiasts.
